tool.name: OGS: createNeumannBc
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'createNeumannBc'.
tool.command: if [ "$in_mesh" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$in_mesh.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$in_mesh' '${$in_mesh.element_identifier}'; fi; createNeumannBc --in-mesh '$in_mesh.element_identifier' --property-in-name '$property_in_name' --property-out-name '$property_out_name' --result-out output_1.txt

param.name: in_mesh
param.label: in mesh
param.help: Input (.vtu | .msh). The surface mesh input file that has an element property for the Neumann boundary condition

param.name: property_in_name
param.label: property in name
param.help: an element property used for the computation of the Neumann boundary condition

param.name: property_out_name
param.label: property out name
param.help: the node based property used for the output of the Neumann boundary condition

tool.help: This tool runs the **createNeumannBc** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
